rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area

rooms.vastu_notes: North facing entrances are considered auspicious; incorporate natural light and plant elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Spacious kitchen with modern appliances. Adjacent to a small pantry area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.vastu_notes: The master bedroom is oriented to the south-west to promote calm energy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet nook dedicated to reading and study. Utilizes natural lighting through nearby openings.
rooms.vastu_notes: Ideal placement in the east for enhanced focus.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A modest living space for domestic help, ensuring comfortable and private quarters.
rooms.vastu_notes: Place in the north-east to support balance.
